nodes.text: Tara Rashin was a Quarren female pirate who led a cell of the Guavian Death Gang.

In 34 ABY, Tara led a cell of the Guavian Death gang to a Cargo transport flew by J-4x, who was working for Mubo on Batuu. A droid repairmen was also present on the transport and ejected the Cargo to the wilds of Batuu and escaped leaving Tara and the rest of the gang on the transport. Before leaving the Transport Tara killed J-4X.

After the cargo landed on Batuu, Tara and the Guavians settled on a base on one of the many spires on Batuu. As Tara stayed in her tower while the rest of her Guavians looked for the cargo but eventually they were picked of by the same Repairman from the transport. The repairman and C-3PO came to the tower main landing pad in search of R2-D2, who was one of the cargo the Guavians needed. Tara Rashin saw the repairman save R2 and came out with her custom AT-RT and battled the Repairman. In the end, R2 knocked over heavy containers and it knocked over Tara and her AT-RT, sending Tara down the long spire to her death.
Tara Rashin was portrayed by Debra Wilson in the virtual reality experience Star Wars: Tales from the Galaxy's Edge.
